website_summaries.verdict: The Apple iPhone SE is the best choice if you're looking for a small, but powerful smartphone.
pros: Easy to use with a single hand

customer_reviews.title: Poorly refurbished phone.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this phone as an in between phone after my 5s broke and awaiting to buy a new one. I was truly disappointed. The speaker and mic quality on phone calls is shockingly bad. The screen flickers occasionally and has done so since day one. Really think they replaced these key components with poor quality/malfunctioning aftermarket parts. Such a shame as everything else works well.
customer_reviews.author: Sio

customer_reviews.title: used phones not worth buying
customer_reviews.text: Did crash repeatedly. Not sure what the sellers test routine involves but it clearly missed some serious faults in this phone. It was not fit for purpose, and should have been scrapped
customer_reviews.author: N C

customer_reviews.title: Very Good
customer_reviews.text: Bit expensive for an old phone but it's what the wife wanted for her birthday so guess as long as she is happy, personally Apple products are rubbish just my opinion. Would buy alternative products from seller as described few mor scratches on back than described but does not effect use and she has a case that covers it. Well she was very happy with it :D
customer_reviews.author: MR B34RD0N

customer_reviews.title: Great so far
customer_reviews.text: Great phone so far. Very fast phone. I am happy that it came looking brand new, without any scratches. It didn't come in any packaging though. Just a random box, which had me worried for a minute, but aside from that, great phone (still the best size iPhone in my opinion).
customer_reviews.author: Denise

customer_reviews.title: Reliable - Great value
customer_reviews.text: The SE may be a few generations behind the latest iPhones. But it does all the basics very reliably. Compared with newer models, the price makes it a bargain, especially having 64 gb.
customer_reviews.author: Average Joe

customer_reviews.title: Its a bargain...up to now
customer_reviews.text: I'm probably tempting the law of sod by writing this but... the phone arrived today...in brand new condition... and everything appears to be working well....up to now....
customer_reviews.author: c-sider

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Product!
customer_reviews.text: Really pleased with this, was a bit dubious about buying a 2nd hand phone but not disappointed at all, excellent condition, top quality and worksxas it should, highly recommended!!
customer_reviews.author: MR S P WOODHEAD

customer_reviews.title: No bigger than a mobile should be
customer_reviews.text: I don’t want a large phone in my pants pocket but need to be up to date and this phone is the best for me. I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Mr R Brown

customer_reviews.title: Bad battery!
customer_reviews.text: Phone in good condition,but the battery is nearly dead!i can see the percentage go down 2 % per minute when under 20 % !
customer_reviews.author: Simeon_lom

customer_reviews.title: Bang for the buck
customer_reviews.text: The state of the phone was better than graded. It took me time to find out the screen scratch mentioned. Battery health was slighty over than Apple recommendations (81%). Came with an USB cable and no original box, but who needs the box anyway?
customer_reviews.author: Pablo Doe

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Excellent - came the next day. Great value & helpful staff
customer_reviews.author: Cathie

customer_reviews.title: Happy with phone but rubbish battery life
customer_reviews.text: Very good phone with not many marks on, in pretty good condition however the battery life is rubbish and the phone has died at 100% on 1 occasion
customer_reviews.author: Amy Marie

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: The phone arrived quickly and matched all the expectations from the description.
customer_reviews.author: Lucy

customer_reviews.title: Excellent buy
customer_reviews.text: This product arrived on time, in good condition and with a clear case, full battery, fully functioning features.
customer_reviews.author: Hindi

customer_reviews.title: It’s almost as if it’s brand new
customer_reviews.text: Pretty much like new. It’s first class. Thank you very much!
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas Sebastian Tracey

customer_reviews.title: Phone arrived promptly and in very good condition. I've had no problems with the phone ...
customer_reviews.text: Phone arrived promptly and in very good condition. I've had no problems with the phone so far and I'm very happy that I was able to get a 64gb iPhone SE for such a reasonable price. Had I bought new I'd probably have chosen lower storage because of the price. I was a bit concerned about buying second hand, but I can thoroughly recommend this option and this seller.
customer_reviews.author: MRS A.

customer_reviews.title: bad phone
customer_reviews.text: The phone is always restarting on its own and showing disordered pictures. I cannot use it for one minute continuously.
customer_reviews.author: Harry Chen

customer_reviews.title: great phone fantastic camera and not as big as the ...
customer_reviews.text: great phone fantastic camera and not as big as the iphone 6. (exactly the same size as the 5) also pink lovely for her!!
customer_reviews.author: Dr G.

customer_reviews.title: better camera, can use apple pay now
customer_reviews.text: Switched after 3 years of a iPhone 5S 16gb Silver. Worth the upgrade, better camera, can use apple pay now, faster processor and better camera and still a compact phone compared to 6. Special price at £369 too, although it was old stock as software was about 6 months behind my 5S.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Amazon fast like always, the product is exactly what I was ...
customer_reviews.text: Amazon fast like always, the product is exactly what I was expecting... however, I found a little scratch on the camera frame, so I cannot be possitive that the phone came straightaway from the Apple warehouse.
customer_reviews.author: pablo

customer_reviews.title: Really Good
customer_reviews.text: Everything came nicly secured. The phone is basically like new and I haven't any problems with it so far.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It is great and works brilliantly
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because I wanted a small phone which fits in a really durable case and still in my pocket. It is great and works brilliantly. I love this phone.
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: I love my iPhone
customer_reviews.text: I have used apple for 5 years now. needed a phone with better memory and this used iPhone 6 64gb phone fitted the bill perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: David White

customer_reviews.title: Generally I like it but it is not as trouble free as ...
customer_reviews.text: There were a few problems getting the phone started, some of the apps wouldn't open for instance, but Apple support helped to get it going. Touch ID worked well at first but now only works occasionally and there are a few other problems that I need to sort. This is my first iPhone and it is taking me a while to get used to it. Generally I like it but it is not as trouble free as I expected.
customer_reviews.author: John B

customer_reviews.title: Be wary...... damaged phones dispatched
customer_reviews.text: iPhone received damaged. When switched on screen had black lines across it. Returned the phone and eventually received a refund.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Defective item, not a trusty place to shop
customer_reviews.text: The phone is broken, the sound switch button does not work. The Touch ID does not work and what is worst I can not return the item because I am unable to erase my personal data incl bank passwords. I am unable to cancel the return and communicate with the seller so it feel I am in a real trap.
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: I really like this phone but I haven't been adventurous with checking ...
customer_reviews.text: I really like this phone but I haven't been adventurous with checking out the special functions. It is a step up from my 5c
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great second hand phone
customer_reviews.text: Excellent second hand phone - no complaints and would definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Rob Roy

customer_reviews.title: As discribed.
customer_reviews.text: Very good. Quick I delivery and no issues. Battery could be better on all iPhones.
customer_reviews.author: A J Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Reliable seller and very efficient
customer_reviews.text: Description of phone was perfect and exact of the product. Seller was efficient and the phone arrived a day before I expected. Would recommend this seller to others and I’m very happy with my new phone. Thank you so much :)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic !
customer_reviews.text: This phone is so good ! The whole thing is amazing ! It is so clever !
customer_reviews.author: Fisherman

customer_reviews.title: The best iphone ever made
customer_reviews.text: Compact iphone with 6s internals. All the features you want, with none you don't in a perfectly designed compact package. Good battery life too. Whats not to like?
customer_reviews.author: mark4

customer_reviews.title: Excellent purchase
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with the iPhone I purchased. Absolutely perfect condition.
customer_reviews.author: mr p smith

customer_reviews.title: Best smartphone ever!
customer_reviews.text: Best smartphone ever for those who don't like bigger screens! everything is perfect, as you would expect from an iPhone.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy! Not as described.
customer_reviews.text: Awful! The phone wasn’t even unlocked. Wouldn’t give me a refund until I they received the phone back stopping me from buying another one. Do NOT buy! Bad company.
customer_reviews.author: Hannah Miller

customer_reviews.title: You won't regret it
customer_reviews.text: I love this phone. Changed from a 5.2 inch huawei p9 lite, just couldn't stand the bulkyness anymore. Also the keyboard on huawei was all over the place, with the se typing is a breeze and always accurate. I don't feel constricted by small format at all. Likewise for media consumption I enjoy the small screen in se just as much. Word of advise buy the apple leather case for se which you can find on amazon for just over a tenner to add a touch of class to an already great phone.
customer_reviews.author: Carmelo

customer_reviews.title: Best phone I have ever had
customer_reviews.text: Best phone I have ever had, I have the best of both worlds by already having an iPad and an Apple Mac computer, I can exchange files/photos between them by air dropping them.
customer_reviews.author: Keith Bailey

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: Love this phone brought brand-new worth the money really happy with my buy
customer_reviews.author: matthew hill

customer_reviews.title: Quality product - a fair price paid!
customer_reviews.text: This phone was advertised as good condition - aesthetically it is immaculate. To me it feels like brand new. It also comes with a year’s guarantee. This provides security. The phone works as it should.
customer_reviews.author: Jacs

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Complicated, but very use full when I am on the move. I have not had it very long, but so far I am extremely pleased with
customer_reviews.author: Peter Lennard

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love it, perfect phone for me. It’s small and powerful. I would buy it again. Too bad it would be outdated. Even with updates maybe I’m not sure.
customer_reviews.author: Stewazza

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good delivery easy to set up fabulous price just love it
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Looked like new and had Apple packaging
customer_reviews.text: Looked like new and had Apple packaging. Really pleased with it now I have it set up and my old number transferred after a mix up.
customer_reviews.author: gerald kushner

customer_reviews.title: A Great Buy the iPhone SE
customer_reviews.text: It is a great iPhone! The same size (physically) as my 'old' iPhone 5S but like Tardis, much bigger inside!! I didn't want the 6 nor the 7 as they are either too big or not that much different than the one I had the iPhone 5S. But the chip and the Camera are awesome! The price was also very good too. So I'm a very pleased (as Punch) person!!
customer_reviews.author: Rogaro

customer_reviews.title: Heating problem
customer_reviews.text: Heating problem. Apple charges awfully but it appears that the SAR rating is quite high. Felt like some one piercing my ear while talking on phone. Everything offered by Apple costs you fortune. Good things should never cost you much. For eg., Air, Water etc.,
customer_reviews.author: Hariprasad

product_meta.title: Apple iPhone SE 64 GB Smartphone - Silver
product_meta.description:
Colour Name:SilverWelcome to iPhone SE, the most powerful 4-inch phone ever. To create it, we started with a beloved design, then reinvented it from the inside out. The A9 is the same advanced chip used in iPhone 6s. The 12-megapixel camera captures incredible photos and 4K videos. And Live Photos brings your images to life. The result is an iPhone that looks small. But lives large.

BOX CONTAINS
iPhone with iOS 9
Apple EarPods with Remote and Mic
Lightning to USB Cable
USB Power Adapter
Documentation
feature_bullets: A beloved design. Now with more to love. iPhone SE takes an incredibly popular design and refines it even further. Crafted from bead-blasted aluminium for a satin-like finish, this light and compact phone is designed to fit comfortably in your hand. A brilliant 4-inch Retina display makes everything look vibrant and sharp. And matt-chamfered edges and a colour-matched stainless steel logo finish the look.

The most powerful 4‑inch phone ever. At the core of iPhone SE is the A9, the same advanced chip that's in iPhone 6s. With 64-bit desktop-class architecture, the A9 chip brings you spectacular speed and responsiveness. And with console-class graphics performance, your favourite games and apps are incredibly rich and immersive. Making it a mighty chip for maximum performance.

The only camera you'll ever need. With a 12-megapixel iSight camera, you can be sure to capture sharp, detailed stills like the ones shot on iPhone 6s. That includes shooting - and even editing - brilliant 4K video, which is up to four times the resolution of 1080p HD video.

An easier, more secure way to pay. Touch ID isn't just for unlocking your phone. It also lets you use Apple Pay in hundreds of thousands of shops and within apps. In shops, just hold your iPhone near the reader with your finger on Touch ID, and you're done. Because your card details are never shared - or even stored on your device - Apple Pay is a safer, more private way to pay.

Hardware and software made for each other. With an easy-to-use interface, amazing features and security at its core, iOS 9 is our most advanced mobile operating system and the foundation of iPhone SE. It's designed to look beautiful and work beautifully on your iPhone, so even the simplest tasks are more fun.
